text: Jackie Keith WhitleyWhitburn, Joel (2006). - The Billboard Book of Top 40 Country Hits. - Second Edition. - New York: Billboard Books. - p.382. - . (July 1, 1954 - May 9, 1989) was an American country music singer. During his career, Whitley only recorded two albums but charted 12 singles on the Billboard country charts, and 7 more after his death. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:1989 deaths Category:American country singers Category:Drug-related deaths in the United States Category:Singers from Kentucky Category:People from Ashland, Kentucky Category:BNA Records artists Category:RCA Records artists
title: Keith Whitley
